scripts.test:e2e-commander: npm run test:e2e:setup && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:e2e:report
scripts.test:e2e:install: npx playwright install-deps && echo 'Browser installation may be skipped in CI environments'

description: This template is a starter for building a website with HTML, CSS and JS, powered by [Vite](https://vitejs.dev/). HTML provides the basic structure, CSS controls formatting, and JavaScript controls the behavior of different elements.
